entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 3:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
Temperature: 3.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over Grand Manan Island late in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain mixed with snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over Grand Manan Island in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
